Interests

About myself

I have an outgoing personality and I'm interested in different cultures. That is why I enjoy traveling and getting to know new people. I am also very fond of different languages (and I speak fluently four languages). I also read a lot, either to study something or just for fun. And like the good Finnish citizen I am, I spend a lot of time at our summer cottage.
